dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.; In margin: 32.; Northern half of India to go with map plate 33 (southern half).; Shows countries, regions, and rivers of India.; From: Black's general atlas of the world. Edinburgh : Adam and Charles Black, 1882.; Plate 32.|41 x 59 centimeters, on sheet 44 x 60 centimeters|Scale [1:4,750,000]|General Map Collection
